long_description: Using your smartphone for GPS mapping, route directions or music while on your bike? The Topeak SmartPhone DryBag 5 offers water-resistant protection and secure mounting for your device. The Topeak SmartPhone DryBag 5 is designed to fit most smartphones with screens 4 - 5 in. diagonally across the screen. Thermoplastic urethane dry bag securely holds your smart phone; clear touch window prominently displays phone screen for use. Sonically welded seams provide highly water-resistant protection, eliminating stitch breakdown and possible entry points for moisture. Included Topeak QuickClick(TM) mounting system allows easy, tool-free attachment of dry bag to stem or handlebar.
short_description: Using your smartphone for GPS mapping, route directions or music while on your bike? The Topeak SmartPhone DryBag 5 offers water-resistant protection and secure mounting for your device.
